name: Residence Baron

reviews.text: I stayed in the Residence Baron the last week in November. I had a single room which was compact but had everything I needed. The room was exceptionally clean and the housekeeping staff was great. Not much of a view but I did not hear any street noise.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was small but nicely laid out - plenty of water pressure, hot water and the towels were changed daily. The single room had an extremely comfortable bed, safe, an electric kettle with coffee and tea, and a flat screen TV. You can access the internet via a keyboard attached to the flat screen TV - marvelous idea. It was much easier to check restaurant reviews and museum hours on the larger screen. You can also access the internet with the hotel's login and password for free.
reviews.title: Highly recommended!

reviews.text: Breakfast was very good. Plenty of hot and cold items (meat, cheeses, etc.), fresh fruit and pastries. Excellent coffee/cappuccino machine along with a selection of teas. The young man who was always present during breakfast to help was great. He kept a careful eye on the food and replenished when necessary, cleared the dishes promptly from the table and was there to help if you needed it.
reviews.title: Residence Baron: Grade A for 3 C's

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located very close to the Central Market and the main shopping street. The Christmas Markets had just started and they were a short walk away.
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would stay at this hotel again for the price and the breakfast.
reviews.title: Residence Baron Budapest Hungary

description: Residence Baron is the newest guesthouse in the downtown of Budapest with 27-rooms, offering four-star hotel services, houses in a beautifully restored and transformed building which was constructed in one of the most prosperous period in the history of Budapest, in the 1870s.The exterior and interior decoration preserves the splendour of the original romantic and secession style, combining it with the modern infrastructure, services and the conveniences of today.The hotel awaits guests with 26 elegantly furnished and well equipped rooms, 1suite, a number of culinary, comfort and medical services, and a conference room for 20 persons.In "Princessin" restaurant, we provide buffet breakfast and a la carte menu for our Guests with international and Hungarian cuisine, wines, and today's contemporary delicacies * Lobby Café * Wellness facilites: indoor heated pool, jacuzzi, sauna ( Finnish and infrared sauna, with Tibetan saltbrick insets)
